attributes.action: One single local authority for somerset
attributes.additional_details:
The good people of Somerset need ONE AUTHORITY in local government as in neighbouring Wiltshire.

Not only does it save MILLIONS in tax payers money,but is convienient for the general public having all departments under one organisation.

All of this "pass the buck"between District council's/parish councils/town councils is just a real pain.

Local District council's/Town council's (like FROME TOWN COUNCIL)are spending money like it is out of fashion.

One council in county hall Taunton with local offices in major towns in Somerset.
